name: Five Doors
description:
Five Doors is a short maths deduction game for 3-5 players. It is inspired by the Five Exits: Escape to Live episode of Running Man. 

https://www.myrunningman.com/ep/460

Players posses 2 visible numbered cards and use the shared properties of these to guess the value of a hidden third card.

Logo Icons by Nhor Phai from www.flaticon.com
